abstract: Colorado Rockies release former pitching ace Jhoulys Chacin.
lead_paragraph: Colorado released Jhoulys Chacin, who had a 6.52 E.R.A. in four appearances in Cactus League games.

headline.main: Rockies Release Chacin, Their Former Ace
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Rockies Release Chacin

snippet: Colorado released Jhoulys Chacin, who had a 6.52 E.R.A. in four appearances in Cactus League games.
